name: Light Domain
description: Clerics who wield the power of light to burn away darkness and reveal truth.

3.Warding Flare: When a creature you can see within 30 feet attacks you, use Reaction to impose Disadvantage on the attack roll, as divine light flares before them. Creature with Blindsight unaffected. Uses: Wisdom modifier times per Long Rest (minimum 1).

Domain Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared.

6.Improved Flare: As a Channel Divinity, when you use Warding Flare on a creature, you can affect creatures within 30 feet of the attacker with the same effect (impose Disadvantage on attack rolls until end of your next turn).

17.Corona of Light: As an action, create an aura of sunlight in 60-foot radius for 1 minute. Bright Light fills area. Each Hostile creature in area has Disadvantage on saves against Fire or Radiant damage spells you cast. Once used, can't use until Long Rest.
